page.title: 19GAMES MONYASH CHILDREN PLAY
page.content:
{The sample:46 children at Monyash {Primary School}(ages 5 _ 11).
{1) Games outside.} 44% ride their bikes,32% play football or some other ball game. {2) Games inside. } 46% prefer to watch television.48% watch up to 2 hours a day.30% watch for less than 1 hour per day.22% watch for over two hours per day.Their favourite programmes are American cops and robbers type adventure series. {3) Playing with friends.} 40% of the children would play some sort of group game like hide and seek,etc.24% would go for a bike-ride or horse-ride. {4) Favourite sports. 36% prefer football and 22% rounders.
